remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow2b .  Evaluate the group action on a left coset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow2b.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow2b.xf $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow2b.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
sylow2b.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
sylow2b.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow2b.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG K ) $.
sylow2b.m $e |- .x. = ( x e. H , y e. ( X /. .~ ) |-> ran ( z e. y |-> ( x .+ z ) ) ) $.
sylow2blem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ B e. H /\ C e. X ) -> ( B .x. [ C ] .~ ) = [ ( B .+ C ) ] .~ ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .x. x y z $.
$d .~ x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d ph z $.
